title: Enzo Bruno
text: Enzo Alejandro Bruno (born 19 March 1987 in <a href="San%20Ignacio%2C%20Argentina">San Ignacio</a>, <a href="Misiones%20Province">Misiones</a>) is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> midfielder who plays for <a href="Chaco%20For%20Ever">Chaco For Ever</a> in <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a>.
